== Azhiyur (CT) (627360) ==

Azhiyur (CT) is a town in the [[Vadakara]] taluka of [[Kozhikode]] district with an area of 9.77 sq. km. and harbouring 6082 households with total population of 30023 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kozhikode]] is at a distance of 60 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 480 km. Male population is 13595 and female population is 16428. Scheduled Caste population is 716 and Scheduled Tribes population is 76. Census Location Code of the town is 627360<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class III (population_total 20,000 to 49,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 60 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 60 km. Railway station is at Mahe at a distance of 1 km.
